channel.title: Background Paper: Civil Society Organisations and International NGOS: Ways Forward in Implementation of the IATI Standard
channel.description: This paper is the first piece of work by the IATI CSO Working Group, addressing the challenges and options for solutions for CSOs publishing IATI data. Final June 2012 IATI Background Paper.doc (390 KB)

item.title: Background Paper: Civil Society Organisations and International NGOS: Ways Forward in Implementation of the IATI Standard
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.description:
This paper is the first piece of work by the IATI CSO Working Group, addressing the challenges and options for solutions for CSOs publishing IATI data.

Final June 2012 IATI Background Paper.doc (390 KB)
